Implement a Queue by linked list. Support the following basic methods:

1. `enqueue(item)`. Put a new item in the queue.
2. `dequeue()`. Move the first item out of the queue, return it.

Example 1:
```
Input:
enqueue(1)
enqueue(2)
enqueue(3)
dequeue() // return 1
enqueue(4)
dequeue() // return 2
```
Example 2:
```
Input:
enqueue(10)
dequeue()// return 10
```
